name: Dungeon Game (coolguy10)
description:
You start off in the Fire Dungeon. Avoid Minions & Spikes, collect treasures, and  find the fire key.

After you get the fire key you spawn to the Fire Boss. Defeat the fire boss with the ray gun.

Then you go to the Ice Dungeon. Just like the Fire Dungeon, you avoid minions, spikes and collect treasures, and find the Ice Key. You might face more challenges in this dungeon.

Finally you fight the Ice Boss with the ray gun.

If you beat him you beat the game and you can start over if you want.
